title: LITRO to introduce Mobile app on gas distribution from Monday
body_lines: LThe LITRO gas is to introduce a mobile application to alert the consumers and agents about the supply, distribution and availability of LP gas.
Chairman Vijitha Herath today said the company is hoping to launch the application on Monday (23).
With the mobile application, the consumers, agents and sub agents would be able to get accurate information of how many gas cylinders could be distributed the areas.
The chairman also requested the consumers to ask the area agents about the date and the number of gas cylinders they will be supplied with before queuing to get them. (Chaturanga Samarawickrema)
